posts.post_content:
1926-1929 Babe Ruth "Exhibit-style" postcard.  This is NOT an exhibit card, as expressly stated on the back along with the normal postcard back features.  

There is a light crease in the lower left corner as shown in the images below.  The back shows some color toning/fading from residing in a postcard album, but no glue was used and there is no damage.

SOLD delivered, net to me, with payment by PayPal Friend preferred.  

PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or ask any questions.

Thanks!
